# A province can only belong to one area!

#Sea Areas:
#No restriction on size.

#Lakes:
#Listed by themselves in order to be easier to remove if needed.

#Land Areas:
# A land area is 3 - 10 provinces
#Fuck you paradox i make my areas more provinces then that 
#Basin of Mexico
